attributes.additional_details: The government should do it out of respect of the best footballer the world has ever seen. Absolute streets won’t forget player.
attributes.background: Give the 33 year old footballing talent a knighthood due to him being very cool and niche.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that ask for someone to be given an honour, or have an honour taken away.

The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
